short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension calculates how much each tweet is worth based on the impressions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that calculates the potential earnings of a tweet based on its impressions. It provides a quick and convenient way to estimate the reach value of a tweet on Twitter.
